name: ArmsHunter_ALPHA
description:
The PLOT:

The main character wants to demonic power, in order to become the most powerful warrior. He was waiting for strong enemies, dangerous arenas, and more. If he'll reach the end?

The CONCEPT (in development):
Gameplay-a mixture of Bloodborne and The Binding of Isaac; the weapon breaks, so you need to find a new, knocking him from his enemies; the levels are generated completely randomly; there are powerups and debuffs (coming soon), and tech additional items.

IMPORTANTLY!!! MANAGEMENT IN VERSION 4.1 AND BELOW:

WASD/Left joystick -- movement;

Left mouse button/B -- a blow;

Right mouse button/X -- to take the weapon/throw weapon/interaction;

Space bar/A + movement -- the jerk;

Space bar/A -- to take additional subject/additional subject quit;

Shift/Y -- parry/extra garments.

IMPORTANT!!!:

Before clicking on "Start" click on "Generation settings".
